page.description: Refresh the contents of the named modeless dialog box.
page.discussion: The UI_MODELESS_DLG_REFRESH() function refreshes a modeless dialog box.

section.title: Example
section.description: This example works in three steps. First, create and display a global variable.
Then change the global variable in the Interactive window.
Finally, refresh the modeless dialog to see the changed value of text.
